name: Birdy Party - Swipe & Match
description:
Swipe and match birds on the dance floor to create super arrangements and combos. Play the new puzzle game craze for free. You'll get addicted FAST!

Discover a game that’s easy to play yet hard to master— even for resolute players. Do you have what it takes to solve hundreds of these unique and fun puzzles?

Explore the colorful world of Birdy Party. Join Prunio on his journey to find his Inner Song and become a dance floor star! Meet new feathery friends along the way as he progresses from Melody Meadows to Groovy City and beyond.

Why will you love Birdy Party?
● Hundreds of levels for 20+ hours of enjoyment!
● Crazy boosters with insane cascading effects for even more fun!
● Challenge your Facebook friends and compete to see who is the grooviest!
● Popping Birds in Pop Stages is more addictive than Bubble Wrap! You have to try this!
● Become a MoonWalk Master with a new special level every Saturday.
● Complete your daily challenge to unlock the Birdy Cup and get eggscellent rewards!
● Crack open your Daily Disco Egg once a day for a valuable prize!
● Play anywhere! No wi-fi or network is required to get your groove on!

Compatible on iPhone, iPad, and iPod with iOS 10 or later.
Optional in-game purchases available. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Follow us for news and updates: www.facebook.com/BirdyPartyGame
